name: Build iOS App
on: [push]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: macos-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: Install Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '22'
      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: npm install
      - name: Capacitor Build
        run: |
          npx cap add ios
          npx cap copy ios
